title: Ep. 240: Pantone's Statement-Making Shade, Spring Trends & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 240: Pantone's Statement-Making Shade, Spring Trends & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Color authority Pantone announced that the color of the year for 2021 will be "Period" red—and we have thoughts. Plus, we share our take on the beauty trends spotted at the spring fashion shows and discuss the news: California’s new cosmetics...
description:
Color authority Pantone announced that the color of the year for 2021 will be "Period" red—and we have thoughts. Plus, we share our take on the beauty trends spotted at the spring fashion shows and discuss the news: California’s new cosmetics bill; faux hair made with forced labor; and a tribute to presidential makeup artist Lillian Brown. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
